thread.title: Girls Aloud trio reunited for Nicola Roberts's 30th birthday
thread.title_full: Girls Aloud trio reunited for Nicola Roberts's 30th birthday

title: Girls Aloud trio reunited for Nicola Roberts's 30th birthday
text:
Girls Aloud trio reunited for Nicola Roberts's 30th birthday Girls Aloud trio reunited for Nicola Roberts's 30th birthday Share 
Girls Aloud stars Cheryl Fernandez-Versini and Kimberley Walsh joined forces to celebrate Nicola Robertsâ€™ 30th birthday. 
The trio, minus former bandmates Sarah Harding and Nadine Coyle, went for the monochrome look as they marked Nicolaâ€™s milestone at Hotel Chantelle in London. 
Cheryl, who wore a Balmain striped dress with Giuseppe Zanotti metallic heels and a YSL handbag, posted afterwards: â€œ@lilcola looking BREATHTAKING for her 30th!!!! Aaaarrgg when did that happen? She was just 17 a minute ago. 
â€œNot a better feeling in the world than dancing until it hurts with these two beauties. Happy birthday Ginge. I love you more than words.â€ 
She also added: â€œMy baby girls all grown up but in the most beautiful way possible.â€ 
The birthday girl, who turns 30 today (October 5), ensured the spotlight remained on her as she chose a dress with a plunging neckline and thigh-high slit. 
Kimberley, who opted for a black-and-white cropped top and skirt, also shared photos of the night, including a shot of Nicolaâ€™s mermaid cake. Amazing 30th birthday party for the one and only Miss @NicolaRoberts thanks to @LoveEnt you're the best! #party #big30 #Nicola 's30th ğŸˆğŸˆğŸˆ 
â€” Kimberley Walsh (@KimberleyJWalsh) October 5, 2015 Share article 
The trio, who had enjoyed a girlsâ€™ night out at the Pride Of Britain Awards a few days earlier, munched on burgers. Promoted Stories
